amendatorysection.catchline: Payment to water rights holders; authorized.
amendatorysection.para: The Legislature finds that water rights holders who lease and forego water use to assist in the management, protection, and conservation of the water resources of river basins must be paid. It is the intent of the Legislature to provide payment to such water rights holders through the financial assistance provided in section 2-3226.07. The Legislature further finds that the financial assistance provided by the state under such section shall be repaid through the authority granted under Laws 2007, LB 701, or such other means as are provided by the Legislature.
